input: Consider the following statements: Under Article 200 of the Constitution of India, the Governor may: P. Withhold his assent to a Bill passed by the State Legislature. Q. Reserve the Bill passed by the State Legislature for the consideration of the President. R. Return a Bill, other than a Money Bill, for reconsideration of the legislature. Which of the statements given above are correct?
explanation: Under Article 200 of the constitution of India, the Governor may withhold his assent to a Bill passed by the State Legislature, reserve the Bill passed by the State Legislature for consideration of the President and return a Bill, for reconsideration of the Legislature.
